A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a piece of garbage! Glaring plot holes\, inconsistent character motivations\, and a blatant disregard for the previous mythos of the Star Wars universe. I can't believe the same critics who bashed the prequels are jumping on the Disney bandwagon and praising this worthless movie.  The Last Jedi makes the prequels look great in comparison\, I won't be wasting my money and ever seeing another Star Wars movie again.
